PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-01492021-03-15,  ,  ,  ,  HC
ActFood and Drugs Act
SubjectInterim Order No. 2 Respecting the Importation and Sale of Medical Devices for Use in Relation to COVID-19
PrecisOrder approving the INTERIM ORDER NO. 2 RESPECTING THE IMPORTATION AND SALE OF MEDICAL DEVICES FOR USE IN RELATION TO COVID-19, made by the Minister of Health on March 1, 2021 in order to continue providing an expedited pathway for authorizing importation and sale of COVID-19 medical devices.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Interim Order No. 2 Respecting the Importation and Sale of Medical Devices for Use in Relation to COVID-19
precis: Order approving the INTERIM ORDER NO. 2 RESPECTING THE IMPORTATION AND SALE OF MEDICAL DEVICES FOR USE IN RELATION TO COVID-19, made by the Minister of Health on March 1, 2021 in order to continue providing an expedited pathway for authorizing importation and sale of COVID-19 medical devices.
